title: Don't we all get free 400 RP?
body: What happened to free 400 RP which were supporsed to be given to all new players? I am level 10 now and i still didn't get my free Riot Points..

replies.body: you should get a premium hextech chest with some starting champs and a skin. They stopped the 400rp when hextech crafting came out.

>Don't we all get free 400 RP?

no
If you haven't gotten the chest yet and you're level 10 then contact riot, and let them know because you're supposed to get it around level 5 or 6.
